scripts.build:comment: echo Usage: `npm run build` performs a local development build
scripts.build:bundle-dev:comment: echo Usage: `npm run build:bundle-dev` builds a development version of the `codap-lib-bundle.js`
scripts.build:bundle-prod:comment: echo Usage: `npm run build:bundle-prod` builds a production version of the `codap-lib-bundle.js`
scripts.build:cfm:comment: echo Usage: `npm run build:cfm` builds CFM for CODAP. Assumes that CFM repository named 'cloud-file-manager' and CODAP repository named 'codap' are siblings.
scripts.build:dev:comment: echo Usage: `npm run build:dev` performs a local development build
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:bundle-dev && npm run build:local
scripts.build:embedded:comment: echo Usage: `npm run build:embedded` builds a CODAP embedded mode package named embeddedCODAP
scripts.build:local:comment: echo Usage: `npm run build:local` performs a local sproutcore build
scripts.build:parser:comment: echo Usage: `npm run build:parser` uses PEG.js to build the formula parser from the grammar
scripts.build:production:comment: Usage: `npm run build:production` performs a local production build
scripts.build:production: npm run build:bundle-prod && npm run build:local
scripts.clean-and-build: clear && npm run clean && npm run build:bundle-prod && npm run build:local
scripts.clean-and-serve: clear && npm run clean && npm run build:bundle-dev && npm run codap
scripts.codap:comment: echo Usage: `npm run codap` launches sc-server. Point browser at http://localhost:4020/dg or `npm run open:dev`.
scripts.deploy:dev:comment: echo Usage: `npm run deploy:dev -- {deployName}` builds and deploys CODAP to 'https://codap.concord.org/~user/deployName'
scripts.lint:fix:comment: echo Usage: `npm run lint:fix` runs ESLint configured to fix issues that can be fixed automatically, e.g. missing semicolons.
scripts.pt:accepted-between:comment: echo Usage: `npm run pt:accepted-between date1 date2` Prints accepted stories for interval
scripts.push:comment: echo Usage: `npm run push` pushes local commits on the current branch to the remote origin, setting up the tracking branch if necessary.
scripts.test:gui:comment: echo Usage: `npm run test:gui` opens the default browser to the DG unit tests. Requires that sc-server be running.
scripts.test:comment: echo Usage: `npm run test` or `npm test` runs DG unit tests via PhantomJS.
